remarks: Existential introduction, using implicit substitution.  Compare Lemma 14 of [Tarski] p. 70.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 6-Mar-2018.)
statement:
spime.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
spime.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
spime $p |- ( ph -> E. x ps ) $.
